units.title: Seed hPSCs for HFO formation
units.text: HFOs are generated by seeding 5,000 hPSCs per well of an ultra-low attachment 96-U-well plate on ‘differentiation day minus 4’ (d-4)
units.rationale: Establishes the initial cell density and plate format for organoid preculture.

units.title: Centrifuge to form aggregates
units.text: Centrifuge the plate at 300g and 4 °C for 3 min to bring the cells to the culture plate bottom, and place the plate into the incubator.
units.rationale: Promotes formation of a single round cell pellet that will become the aggregate.

units.title: Embed aggregates in Matrigel
units.text: On d-2, aggregates are individually embedded in Matrigel droplets (Steps 14–21)
units.rationale: Provides a 3‑D extracellular matrix scaffold for directed differentiation.

units.title: Add CHIR99021 for WNT activation
units.rationale: Initiates biphasic WNT pathway modulation to drive cardiac lineage commitment.

units.title: Add IWP2 for WNT inhibition
units.rationale: Temporally restricts WNT signaling to promote proper heart organoid patterning.

units.title: Daily medium change
units.text: Change the medium after 2 d and then daily by aspirating the medium and adding 5 mL of fresh E8.
units.rationale: Maintains nutrient supply and removes waste throughout differentiation.

units.title: Microscopic quality check
units.text: Before proceeding with further experiments, HFOs should be assessed under an inverted microscope (to observe the HFOs from the culture plate bottom) to ensure proper patterning.
units.rationale: Verifies that organoids have developed the expected morphology before downstream assays.

units.title: Accutase dissociation of colonies
units.text: Add 500 μL of Accutase, and place the plate into a humidified incubator at 37 °C for 3 min.
units.rationale: Gently detaches cells while preserving viability for subsequent seeding.

units.title: Passage confluent monolayer cultures
units.text: Take the confluent T25 flask, aspirate the medium and add 5 mL of PBS w/o. Aspirate the PBS w/o, add 1 mL of Accutase and place the plate into the incubator.
units.rationale: Prepares a single‑cell suspension for reseeding at the appropriate density.

units.title: Flow cytometry analysis of HFOs
units.text: Here, we highlight the flow cytometry‑based analysis of individual HFOs, enabling the quantitative monitoring of lineage formation.
units.rationale: Provides a quantitative readout of cell‑type composition within each organoid.
